Public Remarks: Turnkey midcentury modern architecture meets unparalleled convenience in this urban oasis. This impeccably remodeled 3 bedroom (PLUS a flexible bonus room), 3 FULL bathroom home is move-in ready. The finished BONUS room features a private entrance & heat/AC, perfect for professionals working from home or gym. As you enter the home, you are welcomed by the bright open-concept kitchen/living/dining room with soaring vaulted ceilings. The separate, oversized family room doubles as a luxury home theater, featuring an automated screen & 4k projector! Expanded primary suite retreat has a large walk-in closet with professional organizers and stacking washer/dryer. Your primary bath has dual vanities, heated towel rack, & oversized standing shower. A second ensuite bed/bath is located off the family room, creating ultimate privacy. Upgraded in and out: remodeled kitchen & bathrooms, 3-zone HVAC, vaulted ceilings, solar, 2 EV chargers, 200 amp electrical panel, copper plumbing & more! Modern and low-maintenance backyard features turf, a beautifully paved dining/lounging area, and charming cafe lights. Incredibly central location. Mere blocks away from Valley Fair & Santana Row, with limitless dining and shopping options. Easy commute with easy access to HW 280, HW 17, & San Tomas Expy!

Discover the enchanting allure of this picturesque single-story Colonial, nestled on University Avenue, one of the most distinguished streets in the greater Rose Garden. The perfect blend of charm & modern upgrades, incl. AC, 200 amp panel, hardwood floors, & quality remodeling. The Incredibly functional layout features a welcoming front entry to the formal dining & living rooms. Spacious dining room flows to the kitchen & breakfast nook. The remodeled kitchen honors vintage appeal while meeting modern needs w/ luxury appliances incl. ILVE Italian 6-burner gas range & double oven. Off the kitchen, find a half bath, laundry, & walk-in pantry. 2 separate living spaces w/ cozy fireplaces. The bedroom wing has 3 beds & 2 extensively remodeled baths w/ radiant heat floors. The oversized, 2-car detached garage has epoxy flooring, ample storage, 70-amp panel, 110 & 220-volt wiring, & pre-wired for a 50-amp EV. The expansive front and backyards have been designed for beauty & usability w/ flagstone patio, custom curved redwood deck, pergola, & plumbed for gas. Strategic flora for year-round blooms. The Rose Garden area is a community rich in history & culture w/ easy freeway access to the Bay Area. Enjoy proximity to Valley Fair, Santana Row, the Alameda, & many tech companies in DTSJ
